item.title: Too busy to write a post
item.description: It’s been a lot of time (53 days, to be exact) since I last wrote. But it’s how it is, I have been busy and I am busy with studies atleast for another 3 months. And I am happy about it. A lot has happened in between - that includes my leaving the room at Kalu Sarai (and start of the “then usual” up-downs from home to IIT Gate for classes); a lot of AITS tests which went bad as compared to my standards, leaving me bewildered at my scores; and some blows on my face that got me right on track.

item.title: I have found Happiness
It's decided: IIT first, Web Development later
item.description: Why? It’s the time I have decided to stop thinking about the development of TechGlider.com as for the last 2 months I haven’t been able to do any remarkable work mostly because of being unable to organize my ideas and put them into practice in short periods of 1-2 days I get home for in a week. The burden of study is more and I need to focus on that, forgetting everything else in the world now (after all JEE-2009 is less than 5 months ahead).
